backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining chatroom and messaging system with types for messages, chatrooms, user profiles, reactions, and replies; includes blob storage, HTTP outcalls, access control, and CRUD operations for chatrooms and messages with admin password protection.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, pages, and configuration files describing UI layout, routing, query management, message handling, media support, and styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes; conditionally renders header/footer based on current route and includes theme provider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search with debounced trending/search results, or removal; handles image uploads and updates user avatar state.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface displaying messages with auto-scroll, collapsible header showing chatroom metadata and live status, pinned video area, reply context, and message input; filters out Creator messages without media.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload (image/video/Twitter). Validates YouTube and Twitch URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter post previews using the Twitter widgets script.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing (inline with character limit progress), avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation when in a chatroom. Manages username state and avatar display.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, and embedded media (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, images, voice). Supports pinning videos, adding/removing emoji reactions, and replying to messages with scroll-to-message functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area, image upload, Giphy search, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text. Handles media uploads with progress tracking and displays detected media previews.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button. Renders the video embed based on media type and URL validation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: React hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal for loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence using @dfinity/auth-client. Provides authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom operations (get, search, filter by category, create, delete), message operations (get, send, delete, react), and user profile management. Includes helper functions for username/userId management and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom on iOS, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers in compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas while preserving quality and orientation, with progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom detail page that fetches and displays a specific chatroom using route params, handles loading/error states, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that displays a list of chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, handles actor connection state, includes a create chatroom dialog, and manages recovery from stale cache.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations for accordions, and integrating typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating this is an anonymous chat app with GIF support, with a pending feature request to remove all caller authorization checks from the backend to ensure complete anonymity.
